Container.Name: frp
Container.Overview: Fast Reverse Proxy, wrapped for unraid
Container.Description: Fast Reverse Proxy, wrapped for unraid

Config.Name: FRP Version
Config.Description: Version of FRP to use (amd 64)

Config.Name: FRP config path
Config.Description: FRP client/server config path (leave this alone unless you know what you are doing)

Config.Name: Server / Client selection
Config.Description: Configures whether or not FRP is acting as a server or client (

Config.Name: Server Address (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets remote server address when in client mode

Config.Name: Server Port (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets port for remote server in client mode

Config.Name: Bind Address (Server Mode)
Config.Description: Sets bind address in server mode

Config.Name: Bind Port (Server Mode)
Config.Description: Sets bind port in server mode

Config.Name: Authenticate Heartbeats
Config.Description: Sets whether or not the server/client will authenticate on heartbeat (true/false)

Config.Name: Authentication Method
Config.Description: Sets which method to use for authentication

Config.Name: Token
Config.Description: Sets token for authentication (if enabled)

Config.Name: Enable TCP (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Enables tcp in client mode (true/false)

Config.Name: Enable TCP Range Mode (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets whether to treat TCP port as a single port or range (true/false)

Config.Name: Enable UDP (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Enabled UDP in client mode (true/false)

Config.Name: Enable UDP Range Mode (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets whether to treat UDP port as a single port or range (true/false)

Config.Name: TCP Local IP (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets local host ip for TCP proxying

Config.Name: TCP Local Port(s) (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets TCP Port in client mode, can be range

Config.Name: TCP Remote Port (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets TCP remote port on server in client mode, can be range

Config.Name: UDP Local IP (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets UDP local IP in client mode

Config.Name: UDP Local Port (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets UDP local port in client mode, can be range

Config.Name: UDP Remote Port (Client Mode)
Config.Description: Sets UDP remote port on the server in client mode, can be range
